name: Battle Brawlers-Fair RTS Game
description:
Features:
(1) Core 1v1 and 2v2 PVP battle arena with instant chatting function.
(2) 8 races, 200+ different troops, 10+ distinctive heroes, 40+ magic spells.
(3) There are many amusing modes. Gold Tournament, Master Cards Championship, Group Mode, Crazy Mode and various achievements.
(4) Bullet Screen for live show of battle. It allows players to send bullet screen to cheer or comment.

Game Rules:
Instead of building towers, you need to place troops fighting by themselves. You are not able to move the placed troops. So think and plan well before setting up your troops.

Your troops will move, fight and use skills automatically. At beginning of each round, you will get certain gold for building new troops or upgrading existing ones. Be prepared any time! Attacks of enemy troops will be much fiercer in each new round!

Defense your War God at all costs. Your troops will form the first layer of protection. If enemy troops defeat your troops, they will directly attack your War God. You will win the battle by defeating enemy's War God before yours gets killed. Vice Versa!
